heading: Charlie Thomason
subtitle: Software Engineer. Artist. Musician. Movie lover. Traveler. Chicago, IL
bio: My name is Charlie, and I live at the intersection of creativity and engineering. By day, I am a Senior UI Software Engineer at Centro, and have been writing code full-time for over 8 years. By night, I am an artist who loves working with ink, watercolor, and oil. In 2016, I self-published a book of my paintings titled, Birds of Chicagoland. In addition to being an engineer and artist, I am also a musician and guitarist for the Louisville, KY band Echo's Aim. I currently live in the Lincoln Park neighborhood of Chicago with my wife, Amanda, and cat, Baxter. This website is a portfolio of some of my best art and coding work.
